body.name: HOOBRO 8-Tier Shoe Rack Organizer, Large Capacity Metal Shoe Shelf, Sturdy Shoe Storage with Top Shelf, for 21-28 Pairs of Shoes, Space Saver, Industrial, Rustic Brown and Black BF18XJ01
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 8 mins
features: XXL Shoe Rack: Flats, sneakers and boots are crammed in a closet? No place to put family's shoes all year round? This 8-layer shoe rack completely solves your problem, and is wide enough to holds up to 28 pairs of shoes. It makes a huge difference and renews the messy hallway

Angled or Flat? You decide it. Spacious and open metal shelves at the height of 7 inch easily handles the extensive shoes collection, purses at a flat or slanted angle. The rising lip prevents the shoes sliding off. Just remove one of the shelves. You won't struggle to put high heels and winter boots

Huge Life Helper: Sized at 29.5 x 11.8 x 54 inch, the shoe rack is perfect for front door entrance, living room, bedroom, closet, dormitory, apartment. The shoe rack extends the vertical space while occupying little floor room

All-metal Shelves: The large-capacity shoe organizer is constructed with high-quality particleboard and metal mesh shelves, providing long-lasting performance and strength even though heavy items are put on. The top plate supports up to 66 lb and the shelf supports up to 44 lb. No aging, no bowing is exactly what you expect

Easy-peasy Assembly: Easy to set up in several steps. With the detailed instructions and clearly numbered parts, it takes no time to assemble the shoe rack. The supplied anti-tip accessory imparts the added security, so you don't have to worry about kids running around

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HOOBRO 8 Tier Shoe Rack Organizer Large Capacity Shoe Shelf, Stable and Sturdy The 8-tier shoe rack from HOOBRO will become a shiny star that is always captivating in your room. In addition to displaying shoes for the whole family's shoes, the multifunctional shoe rack works as a kitchen shelf to organize kitchen supplies, or as a corner shelf to decultter the living room's mess.

Previous page High Quality Panel Its top board can a beautiful and practical place for your albums, plants, handbags and other items. Adjustable Feet The shoe rack stands level on uneven ground with friendliness to the floor or blanket. Next page 1 High Quality Panel 2 Adjustable Feet

Specifications Color Rustic Brown Material Particleboard and Metal Product Size 29.5 x 11.8 x 54 inch Product Weight 22.7 lb Load Capacity of Top Shelf 66 lb Load Capacity of Mesh Shelf 44 lb Package Contents 1 x Shoe Rack; 1 x Accessory Kit; 1 x Instructions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This thing is a rock. Solid metal frame without being ridiculously heavy. And it looks great, too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, finally have my garage back
reviews.reviewText: This is best shoe rack, easy to assemble, holdsLots of shoes, can leave out a rack on bottom to create space for boots. Great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly, sturdy, top shelf
reviews.reviewText: Nice rack! And I mean that as wholesome as possible. I thought it was easy to assemble. Had a helper get the first few shelves in, but one could do it by yourself with some patience. Don’t tighten screws until all shelves are loosely in place. The top wood shelf helps the aesthetic & handy. Fits 3 pairs of men’s size 9 shoes on one shelf (photo, LEFT tall rack) with some room to spare.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and classy looking
reviews.reviewText: It has that industrial metal/wood thing going on. Its sturdy and heavy enough to feel not flimsy. Took maybe 15-20mins to assemble and having an electric screwdriver really helped. I've had it almost a year now and it hasnt leaned or broken or warped at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as described
reviews.reviewText: It is sturdy, easy to put together and all types of shoes from boots to sneakers can be accommodated on rack. Nice to have a top shelf as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty looking, fairly sturdy and tall.
reviews.reviewText: Seems decently made metal and faux wood - not sure what that material is but given the overall height of the unit, the only time you will really notice the wooden top is during installation. It's very easy to keep missing it once the thing is installed.It's also decently sturdy though has some wobble, which is expected given its overall height + metal gauge construction. Moreover, it has sufficient space for my suddenly blossoming addiction with sneakers.Can't complain for its intended design but could definitely be cheaper to make it a a 5-Star product overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and solid shoe rack
reviews.reviewText: This one exceeded my expectations! Very sturdy and solid! Not at all flimsy like the plastic ones. It's a bit heavier too. It was a bit more than what I wanted to spend, but all worth it!! We keep it by the entrance door in the garage and everyone who comes through there raves about it. All of them asked where we got it from and very impressed. It did take some time to put it together... watch out for the front and back screw placement. Great purchase!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars holds so many pairs!
reviews.reviewText: I love that the top acts as a shelf, I can put a box of tissue or decorative objects on top. This shoe rack also fits a row of flats or slippers under the bottom shelf of shoes. My boyfriends shoe size is 14 so they do stick out a little bit but but that’s almost inevitable for a shoe size that big. Other than that it’s a great shoe rack for the price.
Use in my pantry. They hold can goods and some heavy items. Works and looks great. Very good material and very sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 19, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Very good quality and very sturdy. You can either put the shoe racks at an angle or straight.
Works and is nice and stable

reviews.reviewTitle: Sturdy and easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: It took 2 people less than 20 mins to put together. It looks great and is exactly what I wanted

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks good, sturdy and makes entry way look nice
reviews.reviewText: As others have written, I'm glad I got this. My entry has a weird design that makes it hard to put any sort of shoe rack. With kids and all their shoes, my wife's as well this does the job well, and fits more than it looks.
